game.name: Pony Birthday Cake
game.description:
Today is a birthday of this little and very cute girl who has huge love for ponies. Unfortunately, her parents are not financially strong enough to present it to her as a gift. However, the good news is that you have got this opportunity to make her feel happy by preparing highly delicious pony birthday cake. Make sure that you shop for all the needful ingredients timely before baking the cake and also taking care of its decoration part. Do your best to make it look like a castle and ponies in this free online cooking game for girls and boys. 

Take a bowl and mix some flour, oil, milk, sugar and eggs in it. Take the batter and pour it in two equal round trays and leave them to be baked in the preheated oven. You can find a special knife in the kitchen. Use it to cute the cake sponge in the shapes of pony. Use your imagination and create a proper body of pony with a tail and a head. Also take care of the frosting part by putting them together. Mix cocoa powder, sugar, and whipping cream and spread the mixture on the pony shaped cake you have created in this brand new online cooking game.

Create the eye with the help of a round shaped chocolate candy. Select a colourful icing in order to create a pony in the desired color. Come out from your comfort zone, show your creativity and decorate the cake in the best possible way in this cool flash game. Do its decoration with the help of strawberries, waffles and marshmallows, caramel and colourful sprinkles or chocolate and cherries. A centerpice decoration helps to complete your cake in this fun kitchen game for kids!
